title: Technical Review on Technology Stocks - SunEdison, Yahoo, EMC Corp, Twitter and Texas Instruments
text: Technical Review on Technology Stocks - SunEdison, Yahoo, EMC Corp, Twitter and Texas Instruments  32:00 Technical Review on Technology Stocks - SunEdison, Yahoo, EMC Corp, Twitter and... -- NEW YORK, September   <-   NEW YORK , September   ACI Association has initiated research coverage on the following equities: SunEdison, Inc. (NYSE: SUNE ), Yahoo! Inc. (NASDAQ: YHOO ), EMC Corporation (NYSE: EMC ), Twitter, Inc. (NYSE: TWTR ), Texas Instruments Incorporated (NASDAQ: TXN ). On Friday, September 18, 2015 , NASDAQ ended at 4,827.23, down 1.36%, DOW declined 1.74% to finish the day at 16,384.58, and the S&P closed at 1,958.03, down 1.62%. Register for your complimentary reports at the links given below. Sunedison Inc . -- On Friday, Sunedison Inc's stock edged lower by 3.01% to close at USD 11.28 . The company's shares oscillated between USD 11.06 and USD 11.53 . The stock recorded a trading volume of 20.53 million shares, which was below its 50-day daily average volume of 32.96 million shares and above its 52-week average volume of 15.45 million shares. Over the last three days, Sunedison Inc's shares have advanced 0.27%. However, over the last three months, the stock has lost 64.18% and in the past six months, the shares have shed 53.92%. SunEdison, Inc. is a developer and seller of photovoltaic energy solutions, an owner and operator of clean power generation assets, and a developer and manufacturer of silicon wafers. Sign up and read the free notes on SUNE at: http://www.aciassociation.com/SUNE.pdf -- Yahoo! Inc . -- The stock of Yahoo! Inc lost 0.61% to end the trading session at USD 30.74 . A trading volume of 20.54 million shares was recorded, which was greater than its 150-day daily average volume of 14.31 million shares and above its 52-week average volume of 19.68 million shares. Over the last five days, Yahoo! Inc's shares have declined by 2.20% and in the past one month, it has lost 13.87%. Additionally, over the last three months, the stock has declined 24.12% and in the past six months, the shares have registered a loss of 31.74%. Further, the company is trading at a price to earnings ratio of 4.47 at a price to book ratio of 0.86. This compares to a historical PE ratio of 6.74. The historical PB ratio is near to 1.22. Register for free on ACI Association and access the latest research on YHOO at: http://www.aciassociation.com/YHOO.pdf -- EMC Corporation -- EMC Corp's stock declined 2.47% to close at USD 24.09 . The company's shares fluctuated in the range of USD 24.01 and USD 24.46 and a total of 17.65 million shares exchanged hands. Over the last three days, EMC Corp's shares have declined by 1.83% and in the past one week it has moved down 2.07%. Furthermore, over the last three months, the stock has lost 11.01% and in the past six months, the shares have shed 9.78%. EMC Corp has a current dividend yield of 1.91%. The company is trading at a price to earnings ratio of 19.75, as compared to the historical PE ratio of 22.56. Additionally, the stock is trading at a price to cash flow ratio of 8.89 and at a price to sales ratio of 1.88. The complete research on EMC is available for free at: http://www.aciassociation.com/EMC.pdf -- Twitter Inc . -- The Company's stock added 2.01% to finish the Friday's session at USD 27.96 . The company's shares oscillated between USD 26.99 and USD 28.25 . The stock recorded a trading volume of 17.51 million shares, which was below its 50-day daily average volume of 21.53 million shares and below its 52-week average volume of 22.06 million shares. Over the last five days, Twitter Inc's shares have advanced 2.08% while in the past one month, it has lost 1.20%. Over the last three months, the stock has lost 22.03% and year to date, the shares have shed 22.05%. Twitter, Inc, the global platform for public self-expression and conversation in real time, is engaged in offering products and services for users, advertisers, developers and platform and data partners. Free in-depth research on TWTR is available at: http://www.aciassociation.com/TWTR.pdf -- Texas Instruments Inc . -- Texas Instruments Inc's stock declined 0.73% to close the session at USD 47.80 . The share price oscillated between USD 47.10 and USD 48.63 . The stock recorded a trading volume of 17.21 million shares, which was above its 50-day daily average volume of 8.49 million shares and above its 52-week average volume of 6.62 million shares. While in the past one week, the shares have moved up 0.48%, they have declined by 1.04% over the last three days. In the last six months, the stock has lost 19.37% and year to date, the shares have shed 8.69%. Further, Texas Instruments Inc has a current dividend yield of 3.18% and is trading at a price to earnings ratio of 17.19. The historical PE ratio stood at 20.79. Additionally, the stock is trading at a price to cash flow ratio of 8.92 and a price to sales ratio of 2.40. The complimentary notes on TXN can be downloaded in PDF format at: http://www.aciassociation.com/TXN.pdf -- About ACI Association: Active Charter Investors Association ("ACI Association") produces regular sponsored and non-sponsored reports, articles, stock market blogs, and popular investment newsletters covering equities listed on NYSE and NASDAQ and micro-cap stocks. ACI Association has two distinct and independent departments. One department produces non-sponsored analyst certified content generally in the form of press releases, articles and reports covering equities listed on NYSE and NASDAQ and the other produces sponsored content (in most cases not reviewed by a registered analyst), which typically consists of compensated investment newsletters, articles and reports covering listed stocks and micro-caps.
